description:
What are the requirements?

  • A copy of Adobe Photoshop CS6 or Creative Cloud installed on your computer
  • Basic computer usage literacy
  • A passion to learn
What will you learn by the end of this course?
  • You will learn how to work your way around the photoshop environment
  • You will know how to create new documents optimized for your project
  • You will gain a basic understanding on using Layers in photoshop
  • You will gain a practical understanding of how to use nearly every tool in the tools palette in photoshop like a seasoned photoshop user
  • You will gain insights through-out on how to achieve great design
  • You will have created a basic poster
  • You will have learned the best practices of using photoshop
What is the Target Audience?
  • This course is best suited for beginners who are serious about learning Photoshop
  • A business owner trying to improve their business appearance.
  • Someone in charge of creating graphics for a church or an organization
  • Someone trying to get started on a new career in design
  • Someone trying to use photoshop at home.
title: Photoshop JumpStart
